member.name: T:CalculatorClassLibrary.Calculator
member.summary: Calculator class. Addition, Subtraction, Multiply, Division. No " , " in this.

member.name: M:CalculatorClassLibrary.Calculator.AddingNumbers(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method adds two numbers together
member.returns: Result of adding number 1 and 2. Addition

member.name: M:CalculatorClassLibrary.Calculator.SubtractNumbers(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method subtract two numbers together
member.returns: Result of subtracting number 1 and 2. Subtraction

member.name: M:CalculatorClassLibrary.Calculator.MultiplyNumbers(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method adds two numbers together
member.returns: Result of multiplying number 1 and 2. Multiplication

member.name: M:CalculatorClassLibrary.Calculator.DivideNumbers(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: This method adds two numbers together
member.returns: Result of dividing number 1 and 2. Division
